amendment.description: Amendment provides funding for the planning, design, and construction of an additional missile defense site capable of providing protection from a long-range ballistic missile attack.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds for Defense-Wide Military Construction by $20 million and increase funds for Defense-Wide Planning, Design, and Architect Services by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Turner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
